patthana1.6:1.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ
patthana1.6:2.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike
patthana1.6:3.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana1.6:3.1_1: hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.6:3.1_2: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:4.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ
patthana1.6:4.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.6:4.1_2: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana1.6:4.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.6:4.1_4: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ;
patthana1.6:4.1_8: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:5.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ
patthana1.6:6.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesike
patthana1.6:7.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā
patthana1.6:7.1_1: uppajjanti hetupaccayā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca
patthana1.6:7.1_3: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:8.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikañca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo
patthana1.6:8.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:9.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikañca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati
patthana1.6:9.1_1: hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:12.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate
patthana1.6:12.1_1: uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.6:13.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana1.6:13.1_1: asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.6:17.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… magge ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.6:20.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā
patthana1.6:21.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā
patthana1.6:22.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena
patthana1.6:22.1_1: paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:23.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā
patthana1.6:23.1_1: hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.6:23.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:24.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā
patthana1.6:25.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā
patthana1.6:26.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa
patthana1.6:26.1_1: hetupaccayena paccayo— asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca
patthana1.6:27.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati,
patthana1.6:29.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.6:29.1_3: saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,
patthana1.6:29.1_5: sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,
patthana1.6:30.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā,
patthana1.6:30.1_7: cakkhuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti; sotaṁ … ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase …
patthana1.6:30.1_9: vatthuṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti;
patthana1.6:31.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā,
patthana1.6:32.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—nibbānaṁ maggassa,
patthana1.6:33.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.6:34.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.6:35.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:36.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:36.1_1: Sahajātādhipati—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:37.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.6:37.1_4: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati,
patthana1.6:37.1_6: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati,
patthana1.6:37.1_9: Sahajātādhipati—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:38.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:38.1_3: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana1.6:38.1_6: pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati …pe…
patthana1.6:38.1_7: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati …pe…
patthana1.6:38.1_10: vatthuṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana1.6:39.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.6:40.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.6:40.1_2: Ārammaṇādhipati—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.6:41.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:41.1_1: Sahajātādhipati—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:42.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā
patthana1.6:42.1_1: saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:43.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā

patthana1.6:44.1_1: purimā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.6:45.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—āvajjanā
patthana1.6:46.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—gotrabhu maggassa …
patthana1.6:46.1_3: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:47.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā
patthana1.6:47.1_1: purimā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.6:48.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:49.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.6:50.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo,
patthana1.6:50.1_13: Pāṇaṁ hantvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṁ deti,
patthana1.6:50.1_20: saṅghaṁ bhinditvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṁ deti,
patthana1.6:51.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:52.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.6:52.1_4: samāpattiṁ uppādeti. Sīlaṁ … sutaṁ … cāgaṁ … paññaṁ …
patthana1.6:53.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.6:54.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo,
patthana1.6:55.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.6:56.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.6:56.1_3: Pakatūpanissayo—ariyā maggaṁ upanissāya anuppannaṁ samāpattiṁ uppādenti,
patthana1.6:57.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana1.6:57.1_2: Ārammaṇapurejātaṁ—cakkhuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati; sotaṁ … ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase …
patthana1.6:58.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana1.6:59.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—vatthu
patthana1.6:60.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā
patthana1.6:60.1_1: saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.6:62.1_1: asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.6:67.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana1.6:67.1_2: Sahajātā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:67.1_3: Nānākkhaṇikā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.6:68.1_1: paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.6:69.1_2: Sahajātā—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:69.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:70.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana1.6:70.1_2: Sahajātā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:70.1_3: Nānākkhaṇikā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā kusalā cetanā vipākānaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:71.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā
patthana1.6:71.1_1: asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.6:72.1_1: kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca

patthana1.6:73.1_1: eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe…

patthana1.6:74.1_1: asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe…

patthana1.6:77.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana1.6:78.1_1: āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:78.1_3: kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.6:83.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo …

patthana1.6:85.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,

patthana1.6:97.1_1: atthipaccayena paccayo— asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca
